messages.content: Use your postal vote for Labour – and help us to build a better Britain

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An NHS with the time to care with 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more doctors, a GP appointment within 48 hours and cancer tests within a week

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Higher living standards for working families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We'll freeze energy bills until 2017 and give households the power to cut their winter fuel bills, raise the minimum wage to £8, and provide 25 hours free childcare for 3 and 4 year olds

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A country where the next generation can do better than the last
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We'll cut tuition fees by £3,000 a year; We'll help first-time buyers get onto the housing ladder, and we'll guarantee every young person an apprenticeship

issues.economy: Higher living standards for working families - We'll freeze energy bills until 2017 and give households the power to cut their winter fuel bills, raise the minimum wage to £8, and provide 25 hours free childcare for 3 and 4 year olds.
issues.education: A country where the next generation can do better than the last - We'll cut tuition fees by £3,000 a year; guarantee every young person an apprenticeship
issues.health: An NHS with the time to care with 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more doctors, a GP appointment within 48 hours and cancer tests within a week

housing.content: We'll help first-time buyers get onto the housing ladder

quotes.text: Labour’s plan is based on one simple idea: that Britain only succeeds when working families succeed.
